channel.title: Comments on: Jeff Buckley Covering “The Boy With the Thorn in His Side”

item.title: By: ajw
item.dc:creator: ajw
item.description:
K, I'm with you on Elliot Smith. So many people over the years have been surprised when I've said that I'm not a fan of his.
My memories of Grace are inextricably linked to WUSC. I played the heck out of that CD on-air in late 1994, and then I wore out my own cassette tape that also had Sebadoh's Bakesale on the flipside. The soundtrack of a few doomed romances.
item.content:encoded:
K, I’m with you on Elliot Smith. So many people over the years have been surprised when I’ve said that I’m not a fan of his.

My memories of Grace are inextricably linked to WUSC. I played the heck out of that CD on-air in late 1994, and then I wore out my own cassette tape that also had Sebadoh’s Bakesale on the flipside. The soundtrack of a few doomed romances.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
I like his music OK, but I never really connected with it. My sister stole my copy of Grace and I didn't really even care. I've always sort of felt the same way about Elliot Smith.
Given the choice, I'd rather listen to Mark Kozelek than JB or ES.
item.content:encoded:
I like his music OK, but I never really connected with it. My sister stole my copy of Grace and I didn’t really even care. I’ve always sort of felt the same way about Elliot Smith.

Given the choice, I’d rather listen to Mark Kozelek than JB or ES.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i'm very surprised. grace is way up on my list of favorite records.
item.content:encoded: i’m very surprised. grace is way up on my list of favorite records.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I've never been much of a Jeff Buckley fan. I know, I know... makes no sense.
item.content:encoded: I’ve never been much of a Jeff Buckley fan. I know, I know… makes no sense.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: I'm surprised you haven't stumbled on this before. Glad to hear it again, though.
item.content:encoded: I’m surprised you haven’t stumbled on this before. Glad to hear it again, though.
